name: ojb's Better Paths Mod
description: Right click the map nodes to highlight potential pathing. Special support for Alt+Right+Click, SHIFT+Right+Click, and SHIFT+ALT+Right+Click on nodes. Also supports quick access to highlighting all nodes of a certain type (right click the items on the Legend).  Please see https://github.com/casey-c/sts_betterpaths for more details.
